name: His Name is _____
description:
Having to give the UNKN0WN S!X a chance to escaped in a Cargo Ship, Non is left behind volunteering to shrug off Hutson's Guards from them. Now for him getting them off his back remains to be unseen.

Controls for Keyboard / Mouse / PlayStation or Xbox Controller

Movement: Arrow Keys Left Click Directional Buttons or Left Analogue Stick Interact: Z Button Left Click X / A Menu/Cancel: X Button Right Click Menu: Triangle / Y - Cancel: Circle / B
